alert.note: Alert for Charles City; City of Colonial Heights; City of Emporia; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Essex; Greensville; King William; King and Queen; New Kent; Prince George; Richmond; Sussex; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued May 27 at 12:33PM EDT until May 27 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 276 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA NORTHAMPTON IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHARLES CITY ESSEX KING WILLIAM KING AND QUEEN NEW KENT RICHMOND WESTMORELAND IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA CITY OF HOPEWELL CITY OF PETERSBURG PRINCE GEORGE IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF EMPORIA GREENSVILLE SUSSEX THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BARNETTS, BOTTOMS BRIDGE, BRAYS FORK, BROWNS CORNER, BRYANTOWN, BUFFORD CROSSROADS, CARET, CENTER CROSS, CHAMPLAIN, CLANCIE, CLARESVILLE, COLONIAL BEACH, COLONIAL HEIGHTS, COWIE CORNER, DRAGONVILLE, DUNBROOKE, DUNNSVILLE, DURAND, EAGLETOWN, EMPORIA, EMPORIA AIRPORT, EMPORIA RESERVOIR, FORT LEE, GARYSBURG, GASTON, GREEN PLAIN, GRESSIT, GUM FORKS, HOPEWELL, HOWERTONS, KING AND QUEEN COURT HOUSE, LITTLE PLYMOUTH, MASCOT, MATTAPONI, MOUNTCASTLE, NEW KENT AIRPORT, ORAPAX FARMS, PETERSBURG, QUINTON, RICH SQUARE, ROXBURY, TALLEYSVILLE, VULTARE, WAKEFIELD, WARSAW, WAVERLY, WAYSIDE, AND WEST POINT.
